short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control YouTube volume with precise input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily control the volume of YouTube videos.
- Use the numeric field that appears on YouTube pages to adjust the volume.
- Enter any value between 0 (mute) and 100 (maximum volume).
- The volume changes in real-time as you adjust the value.
Enjoy enhanced control over your YouTube viewing experience!

1.0 
- Initial launch. 
1.1
 - Added actual volume number, and clear the number when click on button.
1.2 
- Now maintains the volume settings in the browser's localStorage(browser memory), so when you reload or switch to another video, it retains the volume you set.
- Added automatic dark/light mode depending on the browser settings.
- Now retains the volume number in the input field; it does not erase. (Requested by user: Dima Ok).
-Added semitransparent input and button style for better reading. (Requested by user: MadeInUSA Review0).
- Fixed some minor issues.
1.3 
- Fixed the issue for some videos that not maintained the volume when change the video or refresh the page, now it will keep the same volume in every video.

For more features feel free to contact me!
